TITLE: Episode 87 - Standing Your (Rational) Ground w/ Megan Mansell
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie are joined this week by badass SAHM, former district education director, expert on PPE, Rational Ground contributor, and tireless Twitter threader, Megan Mansell. She's been sounding the alarm on the mask-front for the past year and a half, and gives so many reasons why it's not something to shrug off with "it's only a mask.”
